mapper.insert:
insert into orders (
tid, type, state, fws_id, kehu_id, mpcenter_id, ksdate, jsdate, zj, zsj ) values (
default, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fwsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{kehuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mpcenterId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ksdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jsdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zsj,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

insert into orders (
tid, type, state, fws_id, kehu_id, mpcenter_id, ksdate, jsdate, zj, zsj ) values
(
default, #{item.type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.fwsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.kehuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.mpcenterId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.ksdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.jsdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.zj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.zsj,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select:
select * from orders where 1=1
and tid like '%${ tid }%'
and type like '%${ type }%'
and state like '%${ state }%'
and fws_id like '%${ fwsId }%'
and kehu_id like '%${ kehuId }%'
and mpcenter_id like '%${ mpcenterId }%'
and ksdate like '%${ ksdate }%'
and jsdate like '%${ jsdate }%'
and zj like '%${ zj }%'
and zsj like '%${ zsj }%'

and tid like '%${ tid }%'

and fws_id like '%${ fwsId }%'
and kehu_id like '%${ kehuId }%'

and ksdate like '%${ ksdate }%'
and jsdate like '%${ jsdate }%'
and zj like '%${ zj }%'
and zsj like '%${ zsj }%'

select count(*) from orders where 1=1
and tid like '%${ tid }%'
and type like '%${ type }%'
and state like '%${ state }%'
and fws_id like '%${ fwsId }%'
and kehu_id like '%${ kehuId }%'
